name: The Well (DrManatee, Galen Molk, Nickitus, Anniemay Parker, Drillu)
name_original: The Well (DrManatee, Galen Molk, Nickitus, Anniemay Parker, Drillu)
description:
Summary:

Welcome to 'The Well', a 2D platformer where you play as Kigi, a young man wanting to bring life and nature back to his dying village. To do so, Kigi jumps down an old well, hoping to find the plants that left his village long ago. 

The underground is just as barren as up top, with dead vines and weeds littering the soil and many hazards that threaten Kigi's life. But, Kigi's bravery enables him to find precious seeds that cannot only bring life back to the land, but help him traverse the dangerous cavern.

Join Kigi on his journey through the underground and help him and the plants bring life back to Kigi's home! They'll need to work together to make things work.

Controls:

Move Up - W / Up Arrow

Move Down - S / Down Arrow

Move Left - A / Left Arrow

Move Right - D / Right Arrow

Jump - Spacebar

Interact/Pickup - Walk over the item to pickup/interact.

Plant Seed - Drag and drop with Left Mouse Button from inventory.

Water Seed - Click with Left Mouse Button on watering can icon.

Credits:

Anniemay Parker: Writer, Narrative Designer, 2D Artist https://anniemaywrites.com/

DrManatee: Character Artist/Animator

Drillu: Programmer Drillu#2120

Galen Milk: Programmer

Nickitus: Sound Designer and Musician - https://www.instagram.com/nickitus

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam with a theme of Stronger Together.
